message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of continual learning in AI, which is a subfield of machine learning. The proposed model, Gradient Episodic Memory (GEM), is designed to alleviate forgetting and enable beneficial transfer of knowledge to previous tasks. This suggests that the paper could belong to the following sub-categories: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.CV (Computer Vision)
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing)
- cs.CL (Computation and Language)
